quotes.quote: Men are not prisoners of fate, but only prisoners of their own minds.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It's choice - not chance - that determines your destiny.
quotes.author: Jean Nidetch

quotes.quote:
Fortune can, for her pleasure, fools advance,
And toss them on the wheels of Chance.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: The moments that we have with friends and family, the chances that we have to make a big difference in the world or even to make a small difference to the ones we love, all those wonderful chances that life gives us, life also takes away. It can happen fast and a whole lot sooner than you think.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: In the field of observation, chance favors only the prepared mind.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Chance is always powerful. Let your hook be always cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Work and acquire, and thou hast chained the wheel of Chance.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: The sufferings that fate inflicts on us should be borne with patience, what enemies inflict with manly courage.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Destiny is no matter of chance. It is a matter of choice. It is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
